Chloe Young

Group (2024-present):
BADVILLAIN

Introduction

Chloe Doung, known under her stage name Chloe Young, is a South Korean-Canadian rapper, dancer, and songwriter under BPM Entertainment. She is best known as the leader of the girl group BADVILLAIN.

On May 15, 2024, Chloe was revealed as the second member of BADVILLAIN. The group officially debuted on June 3, 2024, with their debut single album "OVERSTEP".
